newsitem.title: USA: Systems of Excellence files Chapter 11.
newsitem.headline: Systems of Excellence files Chapter 11.

text.p: Systems of Excellence Inc said on Thursday it filed a petition under Chapter 11 of the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
The Florida-based company said the filing would not excuse it from complying with injunctive orders entered in connection with a U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission court action.

A purported class-action suit was filed in December on behalf of stockholders alleging that the company and its former chief executive, Charles Huttoe, manipulated the stock price through misrepresentations.
Systems of Excellence makes video tele-conferencing systems.
